attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I'm just doing an experient to see how many people feel that our freedom of Speech as British citizens is slowly becoming a thing of the past.
I would also like to bring to your attention that I am a teenage, i do not know if that makes any difference to your decision but its something i would like you to know.
The idea of this may seem crazy to some, why have a petiotion for this? We already have it.And infact they would be right we do, but in a going multi cultural society its growing increasinly more difficult for everyone to have their say about whether other reigious groups should intergrate into our society or not it seems that it sparks of alot of contravercy. Thankyou for our time.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
